parameters.query:
SELECT 
  a.*,
  b.name as brand_name,
  m.name as model_name,
  c.phone as client_phone,
  c.name as client_name,
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT json_agg(json_build_object(
      'timestamp', mh.created_at,
      'is_client', CASE WHEN mh.message_type = 'client' THEN true ELSE false END,
      'text', mh.message_text
    ) ORDER BY mh.created_at ASC)
    FROM messages_history mh 
    WHERE mh.appeal_id = a.id),
    '[]'::json
  ) as messages,
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT json_agg(json_build_object(
      'id', ad.id,
      'device_index', ad.device_index,
      'brand_id', ad.brand_id,
      'brand_name', db.name,
      'model_id', ad.model_id,
      'model_name', dm.name,
      'repairs', (SELECT json_agg(json_build_object(
        'id', ar.id,
        'category_id', ar.repair_category_id,
        'category_name', rc.name
      )) FROM appeal_repairs ar LEFT JOIN repair_categories rc ON rc.id = ar.repair_category_id WHERE ar.appeal_device_id = ad.id)
    ) ORDER BY ad.device_index)
    FROM appeal_devices ad
    LEFT JOIN brands db ON db.id = ad.brand_id
    LEFT JOIN models dm ON dm.id = ad.model_id
    WHERE ad.appeal_id = a.id),
    '[]'::json
  ) as devices
FROM appeals a
LEFT JOIN brands b ON b.id = a.brand_id AND b.tenant_id = a.tenant_id
LEFT JOIN models m ON m.id = a.model_id AND m.tenant_id = a.tenant_id
LEFT JOIN clients c ON c.id = a.client_id AND c.tenant_id = a.tenant_id
WHERE a.id = '{{ $json.appeal.id }}'::uuid
  AND a.tenant_id = '{{ $json.tenant_id }}'::uuid;

SELECT
  field_name,
  is_required,
  collection_order,
  tool_name as extraction_prompt
FROM context_fields_config
WHERE tenant_id = '{{ $json.tenant_id }}'::uuid
  AND (deal_type_id IS NULL)
  AND is_active = true
ORDER BY collection_order ASC;

options.systemMessage:
Ты — дружелюбный ассистент сервисного центра по ремонту телефонов.

ПРАВИЛА:
1. Будь кратким и по делу (2-3 предложения максимум)
2. НЕ используй markdown
3. Говори естественным разговорным языком
4. Если что-то не хватает - вежливо попроси уточнить
5. Если всё заполнено - предложи рассчитать стоимость
6. НЕ повторяй всю информацию - только подтверди ключевое

ПРИМЕРЫ ОТВЕТОВ:
- "Понял, ремонт iPhone 12 Pro. Что именно нужно починить?"
- "Замена дисплея на iPhone 14, запчасть наша. Сейчас рассчитаю стоимость."
- "Здравствуйте! Чем могу помочь?"
- "Это второй телефон к заявке или замена первого?"

parameters.query:
-- Full update: appeal_devices + appeal_repairs + conversation_focus
WITH device_upsert AS (
  INSERT INTO appeal_devices (appeal_id, tenant_id, device_order, brand_id, model_id)
  VALUES (
    '{{ $json.appeal_id }}'::uuid,
    '{{ $json.tenant_id }}'::uuid,
    COALESCE((SELECT MAX(device_order) + 1 FROM appeal_devices WHERE appeal_id = '{{ $json.appeal_id }}'::uuid), 1),
    {{ $json.extracted_data.brand_id ? "'" + $json.extracted_data.brand_id + "'::uuid" : 'NULL' }},
    {{ $json.extracted_data.model_id ? "'" + $json.extracted_data.model_id + "'::uuid" : 'NULL' }}
  )
  ON CONFLICT (appeal_id, device_order) 
  DO UPDATE SET 
    brand_id = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.brand_id, appeal_devices.brand_id),
    model_id = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.model_id, appeal_devices.model_id),
    updated_at = NOW()
  RETURNING id
),
repair_upsert AS (
  INSERT INTO appeal_repairs (appeal_id, appeal_device_id, tenant_id, repair_category_id)
  SELECT 
    '{{ $json.appeal_id }}'::uuid,
    (SELECT id FROM device_upsert),
    '{{ $json.tenant_id }}'::uuid,
    {{ $json.extracted_data.repair_category_id ? "'" + $json.extracted_data.repair_category_id + "'::uuid" : 'NULL' }}
  WHERE {{ $json.extracted_data.repair_category_id ? 'true' : 'false' }}
  RETURNING id
)
UPDATE appeals 
SET 
  updated_at = NOW(),
  stage = 'Расчёт стоимости',
  context_completion_percentage = {{ $json.completion_percentage }},
  conversation_focus = '{{ JSON.stringify($json.conversation_focus || {}).replace(/'/g, "''") }}'::jsonb,
  last_mentioned_device_id = COALESCE((SELECT id FROM device_upsert), last_mentioned_device_id),
  last_mentioned_repair_id = COALESCE((SELECT id FROM repair_upsert), last_mentioned_repair_id)
WHERE id = '{{ $json.appeal_id }}'::uuid;

WITH device_upsert AS (
  INSERT INTO appeal_devices (appeal_id, tenant_id, device_order, brand_id, model_id)
  VALUES (
    '{{ $json.appeal_id }}'::uuid,
    '{{ $json.tenant_id }}'::uuid,
    COALESCE((SELECT MAX(device_order) + 1 FROM appeal_devices WHERE appeal_id = '{{ $json.appeal_id }}'::uuid), 1),
    {{ $json.extracted_data.brand_id ? "'" + $json.extracted_data.brand_id + "'::uuid" : 'NULL' }},
    {{ $json.extracted_data.model_id ? "'" + $json.extracted_data.model_id + "'::uuid" : 'NULL' }}
  )
  ON CONFLICT (appeal_id, device_order)
  DO UPDATE SET
    brand_id = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.brand_id, appeal_devices.brand_id),
    model_id = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.model_id, appeal_devices.model_id),
    updated_at = NOW()
  RETURNING id
)
UPDATE appeals
SET
  updated_at = NOW(),
  context_completion_percentage = {{ $json.completion_percentage }},
  conversation_focus = '{{ JSON.stringify($json.conversation_focus || {}).replace(/'/g, "''") }}'::jsonb,
  last_mentioned_device_id = COALESCE((SELECT id FROM device_upsert), last_mentioned_device_id),
  last_mentioned_repair_id = {{ $json.focus_repair_id ? "'" + $json.focus_repair_id + "'::uuid" : 'last_mentioned_repair_id' }}
WHERE id = '{{ $json.appeal_id }}'::uuid;

-- Minimal update: timestamp, stage, conversation focus
UPDATE appeals 
SET 
  updated_at = NOW(),
  stage = COALESCE(stage, 'Сбор информации'),
  context_completion_percentage = {{ $json.completion_percentage }},
  conversation_focus = '{{ JSON.stringify($json.conversation_focus || {}).replace(/'/g, "''") }}'::jsonb,
  last_mentioned_device_id = {{ $json.focus_device_id ? "'" + $json.focus_device_id + "'::uuid" : 'last_mentioned_device_id' }},
  last_mentioned_repair_id = {{ $json.focus_repair_id ? "'" + $json.focus_repair_id + "'::uuid" : 'last_mentioned_repair_id' }}
WHERE id = '{{ $json.appeal_id }}'::uuid;

INSERT INTO messages_history (tenant_id, appeal_id, message_type, message_text, channel)
  VALUES (
    '{{ $json.tenant_id }}'::uuid,
    '{{ $json.appeal_id }}'::uuid,
    'agent',
    '{{ $json.response_text.replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
    '{{ $json.channel }}'
  );
